name: Tailwind Color Palettes
description:
This plugin will add Tailwind Color Styles to your figma file. You can choose between the available presets.


Color Palettes:

  • https://tailwindcss.com/docs/customizing-colors
  • https://v2.tailwindcss.com/docs/customizing-colors
  • https://v1.tailwindcss.com/docs/customizing-colors#default-color-palette
  • Tailwind UI Color Palette


Helper:

  • https://varundevpro.com/tailwind-plugin-helper-ui/


Thanks!


If you enjoy this plugin, please follow me on twitter.
